name: ScorpionSecurity
description: An advanced security bot for your TELEGRAM Account.with inline buttons

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable heroku.

STRING_SESSION.description: Get this value by running python3 telesetup.py locally oorhttps://replit.com/@loverboyXD/SESSIONSTRING-GEN

DM_TEXT.description: The message that appears when someone PM's you.

CMD_HNDLR.description: Used to invoke commands, leave blank for default, (dot)

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Go to https://dashboard.heroku.com/account, scroll down and press Reveal API.Required for updater to work.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: The Value of App Name you filled in right on top.Required for updater to work.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at @BotFather and get the token of your bot.

MAX_SPAM.description: Number of messages one can send in your PM before being approval.

PM_PIC.description: telegra.ph link to theimage you want as pmpermit pic, leave blank for default one!
